Zineb Sedira (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye France-Algeria na-ese foto na onye na-ese vidio na London, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na-enyocha mmekọrịta mmadụ na ala.
E depụtara Sedira maka ihe nrite 2021 Deutsche Börse Photography Foundation Prize.
A mụrụ Zineb Sedira na 1963 na mpaghara Gennevilliers nke Paris; nne na nna ya bụ ndị si Algeria kwabata. Ọ kwagara England n'afọ 1986.
Sedira nwetara nzere BA na Critical Fine Art Practice na Central Saint Martins nke London, wee nweta MFA na Slade School of Fine Art na 1997
O mechara nọrọ afọ ise na-eme nnyocha na Royal College of Art
Ọrụ mbụ Sedira lekwasịrị anya na foto ụmụ nwanyị n'ụwa ndị Alakụba, na-egosi foto nke nne ya na nwa ya nwanyị
Ikiri nne ya ka haik na-enye mgbe ọ rutere Algiers nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na Sedira
"M na-echeta ozugbo anyị si n'ụgbọelu rịtuo wee rute n'ụlọ ya, ọ ga-emeghe igbe ahụ ma wepụ ya, "ka o kwuru na 2013

Ihe nkiri vidio ya, Mother Tongue (2002) na-egosi onwe ya, nwa ya nwanyị, na nne ya na-ekwu okwu na "asụsụ" ha, French, English, na Arabic n'otu n'otu, na Sedira na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ụzọ asụsụ n'etiti nne ya na nwa ya nwanyị bụ ndị na-enweghị asụsụ ha. Na Septemba 2020 a mara ọkwa na Sedira ga-anọchite anya France na 59th Venice Biennale, na 2022.
A na-edebe ọrụ Sedira na nchịkọta ọha na eze ndị a:
